title: Kamala Harris Drops Insane Claim About Her Wikipedia Page: "It's like literally, they just want to make us smaller!"
description:
Kamala Harris is just over 5′4. That is how tall she is. No one in the world cares. No one. But she has it in her lack of a brain that the world is purposely miscalculating her height to make her seem smaller. And that is not an assumption. She literally said that.


— (@)

When your whole sense of self-worth is based on insignificant uncontrollable birth traits, like your skin color and your height, things like this can crush your whole reality. That is how fragile these people are. Their whole worldview is intentionally focused on uncontrollable things because that is how they refuse to accept accountability for anything.

title: Judge Rules That, No, A Sheriff Could Not Arrest A GOP Official Just Because She Criticized Him
description:
A GOP official was arrested because she criticized the local sheriff.

I assume that the sheriff took an oath to protect the Constitution. This means he would have broken his oath because, in America, you are not allowed to abuse your power or arrest people you disagree with.

Just watch how dumb this officer is.

— (@)

Awwww. His little feelings got here.

title: Woman Stabs Her Boyfriend 108 Times, Gets No Jail Time Thanks To A Lame Excuse By The Judge
description:
A woman killed her boyfriend by stabbing him 108 times. But she won’t be spending any time in prison. And to no surprise, the incident happened in California.

— (@)

According to The New York Post:

“The California woman who was convicted of killing her boyfriend by stabbing him 108 times during a “cannabis-induced psychosis” received a slap on the wrist Tuesday.

title: “Patriarchy in a Nutshell": 'Barbie’ Fans Cry Sexism After Margot Robbie Was Shut Out From Oscar Nomination
description:
“Barbie'' was the highest-grossing movie of 2023 at $636,225,983. Margot Robbie’s salary was $12.5 million. That was just from her salary. Her current estimated net worth is $60 million. This is a $20 million increase from 2023, which is mainly a result of the $50 million she is believed to have made in total off Barbie.

title: Crowder GOES OFF on globalist conference:  "Everything about the WEF is anti-human"
description:
For every start of a new year also comes the annual World Economic Forum in Davos where unelected bureaucrats lecture the world with their self-appointed God complex. Today’s show featured a resurfaced clip of Prof. Yuval Noah Harari claiming that human rights are nothing more than a figure of your imagination.

"It's the worst time of the year," Crowder said. "I think it shows the fundamental difference between Conservatism and Progressive and this idea of globalism. You rarely get something that is so encapsulating of what is wrong with the left. I like borders. I want the United States to be different from the rest.”

Harari is the best-selling author of the book "Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind." It was recommended by Barack Obama and Bill Gates, so no one

title: Globalists found something else they want to take away from you... your morning cup of coffee
description:
Rule 69-420 states that if it's something Americans enjoy, there is a progressive somewhere who wants to ban it. And/or call it racist. The same is true on a global scale, as we see at the annual globalist CPAC conference in Davos put on by the World Economic Forum. If there is something citizens enjoy anywhere -- like freedom -- the WEF wants to take it away and claim you'll never be happier.

The latest thing on the list? Coffee.

Hubert Keller, a Swiss banker who is "passionate about sustainability" and calls for "environmental transition and to a more inclusive economic framework" says that your coffee is destroying the planet. Which, at this point

title: Chuck Schumer demands a ban on Zyn, creates a powerful new enemy for Dems: "This is 9/11 for frat guys"
description:
Zyn was getting too popular. It was only a matter of time before Rule 69-420 went into effect: If it is something Americans enjoy, there is a progressive somewhere who wants to ban it. Now Chuck Schumer is coming along to take your upper deckies away.

Zyn's a pouch you can chew on to get your nicotine fix without having to smoke cigarettes or look like a douche vaping. I don't get the Zyn thing, but I've transitioned into the 45-55 demographic. I've also only smoked a total of five cigarettes in my life. Five tobacco cigarettes, anyway. It still feels weird that pot is mostly legal now.
